Website side files

Rpg-v0.0.0-70.t All the files describes below are website side.

These are tranfered with the FTP (File Transfer Protocol). When we must modify one of these files, a filename.lock is created.

The registrDate and registrTime attributes are deleted if we confirm the mailAdresse. If the email adresse is not confirmed the confirmeDate field does not exist.

website information

A xoops module has been added to the site to show a real-time information on the online servers.
